text: Bizalom, also known as Confidence in English, is a 1980 Hungarian World War II drama movie directed by István Szabó and starring Ildikó Bánsági, Péter Andorai, Oszkárné Gombik, Károly Csáki, Tamás Dunai, Zoltán Bezerédi, Gyula Gazdag. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1981. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980 war movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by István Szabó
title: Bizalom
